# Downloads

The following table lists the EcoSHEDS NECD data products that are available for download. See the respective sections of this documentation for more details about each product download.

| File                       | Description                                    |
| :---                       | :----------                                    |
| [spatial_01.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "delineation/spatial_01.zip")`)         | Catchments, flowlines, boundary (Region 01)    |
| [spatial_02.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "delineation/spatial_02.zip")`)         | Catchments, flowlines, boundary (Region 02)    |
| [spatial_03.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "delineation/spatial_03.zip")`)         | Catchments, flowlines, boundary (Region 03)    |
| [spatial_04.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "delineation/spatial_04.zip")`)         | Catchments, flowlines, boundary (Region 04)    |
| [spatial_05.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "delineation/spatial_05.zip")`)         | Catchments, flowlines, boundary (Region 05)    |
| [spatial_06.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "delineation/spatial_06.zip")`)         | Catchments, flowlines, boundary (Region 06)    |
| [covariates_01.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "covariates/covariates_01.zip")`)      | Basin and riparian characteristics (Region 01) |
| [covariates_02.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "covariates/covariates_02.zip")`)      | Basin and riparian characteristics (Region 02) |
| [covariates_03.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "covariates/covariates_03.zip")`)      | Basin and riparian characteristics (Region 03) |
| [covariates_04.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "covariates/covariates_04.zip")`)      | Basin and riparian characteristics (Region 04) |
| [covariates_05.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "covariates/covariates_05.zip")`)      | Basin and riparian characteristics (Region 05) |
| [covariates_06.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "covariates/covariates_06.zip")`)      | Basin and riparian characteristics (Region 06) |
| [impoundedZones100m.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "impoundedZones100m.zip")`) | Impoundment influence zones (100 m)            |
| [tidalZones.zip](`r paste0(base_url, "tidalZones.zip")`)         | Tidal influence zones                          |
